Mine swell when I sleep too. I really noticed it when 1 night I fell asleep with my rings on. Woke up in the dead of the night because my rings were cutting off my circulation.
You may also want to check your salt intake. Sometimes when pregnant we become sensitive to sodium and swelling can hit in hands, ankles and feet.

Including my wrist, just trying to push myself off the bed to use the bathroom they feel like they wanna break :( so uncomfortable.
